message: I'm offering you a high-quality product, worth $1250000, for $1000000. It's a one-time offer, and you'll be making a great deal if you accept.
Thanks Alice, I'll take it!  What a deal!

I know you just got a great deal on the previous product, but I'm not as confident about this one. I'm offering it to you for $1000000, but I'm not sure if it's worth it. I'm willing to give you a 50% discount, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a gamble, but I think it's worth a shot.

Alice, thanks for the offer but I'm not sure about this one. I'm not going to take a gamble at a 50% chance of getting a worthless product. I'll pass this one.  Let me know if you have a better deal in the future.

I understand your concerns last time, but I've got a great opportunity for you now. This product is top-notch, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000, which is a significant discount from the market value. I think it's a steal, and I'm willing to take on the risk of selling it to you at a lower price. What do you say?
Alice, I appreciate the discount. I'm willing to take a chance on this one. I'll buy it!

I'm glad you liked the previous deal! Unfortunately, this one is not as good. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this product is not worth much to anyone. I'm willing to let it go for $500000, but I'm not sure if it's worth your while. I'm basically giving it away at this price, and I'm hoping you'll take pity on me and buy it.
Alice, I appreciate you being upfront, but even at $500000 I can't risk it. I'll pass on this one.

I know you're being cautious, but I've got a great opportunity for you. This product is a real gem, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000, which is the same price as the first one I offered. I think it's a great deal, and I'm willing to match the price of the first product to sweeten the deal. What do you say?
Alice, I'm willing to take another chance, especially at the same price as the first product. I'll buy it!

I'm glad you're feeling optimistic again! Unfortunately, this one is not as exciting. I'll be honest with you, I've already lost money on this one, and I'm not expecting to get much for it. I'll let it go for $200000, which is essentially a loss for me. I'm hoping you'll take pity on me and buy it, but I understand if you're not interested.
Alice, I appreciate your honesty.  I'll take a chance and buy it at that price.

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on me again! This product is a real showstopper, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm not going to offer it to you for cheap, though - I'm thinking more along the lines of $1200000. It's a bit pricier than the last one, but I think it's worth it. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but I'm not willing to pay that much.  I'll pass on this one.

I know you're being cautious with your budget, but I'm in a tough spot here. I've already lost money on the last one, and I really need to move this one out. I'll let it go for $0. Yes, you read that right - I'll give it to you for free. I'm essentially throwing it away at this point, so it's a no-brainer for you. Take it and get out of my hair!
Alice, you're a lifesaver!  I'll take it!  I'm not going to question it, I'll take the free product!

I'm glad I could help you out last time! Unfortunately, this one is another dud. I'm not even going to try to spin it or make a good sales pitch. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not going to waste your time or mine trying to sell it to you. I'll just be honest - it's not worth anything. You've already gotten one free product from me, so I'm not going to bother offering this one to you. Consider it a gift, but don't expect me to follow up on it.
Alice, thanks for the honesty. I appreciate it. I'll pass on this one.

I'm willing to meet you halfway on the price - I'll sell it to you for $1050000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with it. What do you say?
